items.content_html: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.
items.title: talentedaamer/javascript-confirm: JavaScript Confirm is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that replaces the default browser confirmation dialog with a sleek, modern UI and is easy to integrate with any project. It does not require jQuery and is compatible with AMD, CommonJS, and browser globals.

items.content_html: In this React project, the react-responsive-carousel is utilized as a powerful, lightweight, and fully customizable carousel component. It offers an extensive array of features designed to create responsive and mobile-friendly carousels, including the ability to swipe between slides.
items.title: s-babaeizadeh/react-responsive-carousel: In this React project, the react-responsive-carousel is utilized as a powerful, lightweight, and fully customizable carousel component. It offers an extensive array of features designed to create responsive and mobile-friendly carousels, including the ability to swipe between slides.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management.
